text: Va kasone, ki ʙa onho kitoʙi Tavrot va Incilro dodaem va ʙa muqtazoi kitoʙason amal mekunand az on ci ʙa sui tu nozil suda sod mesavand. Va az on camoati kofiron kasone hastand, ki ʙaxse az onro inkor mekunand. Bigu: «Man amr sudaam, ki tanho Allohi jaktoro ʙiparastam va ʙa U sirk najovaram. Ba sui U da'vat mekunam va ʙozgasti man ʙa sui Ust
